meanings.definition: To give a brief summary of something.
meanings.sent1: She synopsizes the movie for her friends before they watch it.
meanings.sent2: The teacher synopsizes the chapter at the end of each lesson.
meanings.sent3: He always synopsizes the plot of the movie in a funny voice.
meanings.sent4: Her mind quickly synopsizes the key points of the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The infographic synopsizes the data in a clear and engaging way.

meanings.definition: To summarize or condense a text or story.
meanings.sent1: The article synopsizes the main events of the historical period.
meanings.sent2: He synopsizes the novel into a short paragraph for his presentation.
meanings.sent3: The comedian hilariously synopsizes the classic tale in his stand-up routine.
meanings.sent4: Her memory synopsizes the details of the story like a highlight reel.
meanings.sent5: The app synopsizes news articles to save time for busy readers.
